titles.title: Puerto Rico Medicare Reimbursement Equity Act of 2009
Puerto Rico Medicare Reimbursement Equity Act of 2009
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to increase inpatient hospital payments under the Medicare Program to Puerto Rico hospitals.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Puerto Rico Medicare Reimbursement Equity Act of 2009 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to revise the formula for the Medicare inpatient hospital services payment rate for Puerto Rico hospitals to: (1) reduce the applicable Puerto Rico percentage from 25% to zero; and (2) increase the applicable federal percentage from 75% to 100%.
